memberdef.name: CHECK_CPCorr
memberdef.initializer: if (Arg.code() == CP::CorrectionCode::Error){ \ Error(#Arg,"Correction Code 'Error' (returned in line %i) ",__LINE__); \ return 1; \ }

detaileddescription.para: a simple testing macro for the MuonEfficiencyCorrections_xAOD package in RC shamelessly stolen from CPToolTests.cxx

briefdescription.para: Example of how to run the MuonEfficiencyCorrections package to obtain information from muons.
